title: Maid-san wa Taberu dake
original_name: メイドさんは食べるだけ
sinopse:
Suzume works as a maid in an English manor house. Due to a certain incident, she ends up living in a small apartment in Japan, so where does she find comfort in as she began living overseas by herself for the first time? Japanese cuisine!

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
